member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsExternalInit
member.summary: Reserved to be used by the compiler for tracking metadata. This class should not be used by developers in source code.
member.remarks: This definition is provided by the IsExternalInit NuGet package (https://www.nuget.org/packages/IsExternalInit). Please see https://github.com/manuelroemer/IsExternalInit for more information.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.AzureFunctions.Nodes.ProjectTriggersVisitor
member.summary: A visitor class that can scan project's assembly and find all object model components specific to given initializers collection.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.AzureFunctions.Nodes.TriggerProvider
member.summary: This provider checks files and types and detects if there is dependency on any function trigger. If any trigger found, returns trigger slice nodes to allow special actions related for triggers (for example add a NuGet package in a new Azure Function version).

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.AzureFunctions.Nodes.TriggersFolderProvider
member.summary: This provider creates a virtual folder "Triggers" for a function project.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.AzureFunctions.Resources.Strings
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.AzureFunctions.Resources.Strings.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.AzureFunctions.Resources.Strings.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.AzureFunctions.Resources.Strings.AddingCtorWithInjectedTypeToClass
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Adding constructor with injected '{0}' to '{1}'..

member.name: P:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.AzureFunctions.Resources.Strings.AspNetCoreTemplateDescription

member.name: P:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.AzureFunctions.Resources.Strings.AspNetCoreTemplateName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to ASP .NET Core Integration.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.AzureFunctions.TargetFrameworks.FunctionsTargetFrameworkProvider
member.summary: Azure Functions target framework matcher.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.AzureFunctions.Traits.FunctionsTraitProvider
member.summary: Discover AzureFunctions traits. Sometimes AzureFunctions capability is appearing late after restore and we could inject a trait AzureFunctions explicitly here if we see corresponding AzureFunctionsVersion property in the project. Also we inject AzureFunctionsVx traits for telemetry purpose (or it could be usable for transformers later if we need to condition them on some functions version). We also inject the different triggers that are found in the project.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.AzureFunctions.Transformers.Code.CSharp.FunctionsAspNetCoreTransformer
member.summary: Transforms functions to integrate ASP.NET core by checking if the project has a Program.cs file, it will replace the ConfigureFunctionsWorkerDefaults method with ConfigureFunctionsWebApplication method.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.AzureFunctions.Transformers.Code.CSharp.FunctionsAspNetCoreTransformer.ConfigureMethodProcessor
member.summary: Replaces ConfigureFunctionsWorkerDefaults method with corresponding ConfigureFunctionsWebApplication method depending on arguments passed in.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.AzureFunctions.Transformers.Code.CSharp.FunctionsBlobTransformer
member.summary: Transforms functions to remove Access Rights for Blob functions and update them to be BlobInput or BlobOutput

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.AzureFunctions.Transformers.Code.CSharp.FunctionsServiceBusTransformer
member.summary: Transforms functions to remove Access Rights for ServiceBusTrigger and ServiceBusOutput bindings.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.AzureFunctions.Transformers.Code.CSharp.FunctionsUpdateHttpTriggerTransformer
member.summary: Transforms functions to remove WebHookProperty for Host V1 HttpTriggers and adds a comment for users to add middleware.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.AzureFunctions.Transformers.Code.CSharp.FunctionsUpdateOutputBindingTransformer
member.summary: Transforms function to create output binding if the in-proc function has return type attribute for all extensions.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.AzureFunctions.Transformers.Code.CSharp.TraceWriterToLoggerTransformer
member.summary: Replaces TraceWriter method calls to corresponding ILogger methods.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.AzureFunctions.Transformers.Code.CSharp.TraceWriterToLoggerTransformer.TraceMethodProcessor
member.summary: Replaces TraceWriter.Trace(...) method with corresponding LogXxx method depending on a TRaceLevel argument. If we cannot determine TraceLevel we do nothing.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.AzureFunctions.Transformers.Code.CSharp.TraceWriterToLoggerTransformer.FlushMethodProcessor
member.summary: Removes TraceWriter.Flush method call.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.AzureFunctions.Transformers.Project.FunctionsRemoveOldPackagesTransformer
member.summary: Removes old functions packages from the project.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.AzureFunctions.Transformers.Project.FunctionsTriggerDependenciesTransformer
member.summary: Adds extra package dependencies for function trigger types

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.AzureFunctions.Transformers.Project.FunctionsPropertyTransformer
member.summary: As users migrate their azure functions to new versions this transformer handles the changes that occur in the .csproj file of the function in place It updates the version of the function to the latest version, converts the function into an .exe, and adds execution context value.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.AzureFunctions.Transformers.Package.FunctionsPackageMapTransformer
member.summary: AzureFunctions default packages transformer (uses package map embedded json file to decide how to upgrade packages).

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Nodes.Providers.Rules.NuGet.AzureFunctionsNuGetPackagesRuleProvider
member.summary: Returns rules that suggest to remove Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs. packages for functions projects.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.Code.CSharp.IdentifierNameProcessor
member.summary: A helper contract that allows to have atomic transformations for identifier name syntax nodes.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.Code.CSharp.InvocationProcessor
member.summary: A helper contract that allows to have atomic transformations for invocation syntax nodes.
